title: Can You Deduct Pool Installation Costs? The Surprising Answer
subtitle: Explore the tax implications of installing a personal pool and how medical necessity may lead to deductions.
content:
Can You Deduct Pool Installation Costs? The Surprising Answer

Tyler?

Yep.

It says here you’re trying to deduct $200,000 for installing a personal pool?

Yep.

Okay, this has gone too far.

No, here's my doctor's note. I have bronchial issues and need a pool for daily medical treatment.

And you can write this off?

I can write off the cost of the pool installation, less the increase in my home value.

Well, don’t smile too much, as pools are pretty expensive to upkeep.

Oh, I know. And I can thank you for that because I can write off the cost of pool upkeep too.

Well, off to rehab. Let me know when the check’s in the mail. I need new floaties.
